fields.Title: PLAZA / RENE PETANQUE
START
input
Hand/Eye Coordination: "Something about it was completely u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something about it was completely unnatural. Corrupted. Your muscle memory knew what to do and went for it, but there were gaps...

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""A fine example you are setting her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A fine example you are setting here today, officer." He says, slowly shaking his head. "I will remember this. And Gaston will too."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Suggestion: "Just talk. It'll smooth things over..."]
Esprit de Corps: "It's your refusal to take responsib..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's your refusal to take responsibility I don't like.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""*Mon dieu*..." he mumbles, rubbing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Mon dieu*..." he mumbles, rubbing his temples. "Alright. Alright. Fine. What do you want, officer?"

You: ""Problem? I don't understand.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Problem? I don't understand."

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You are immediately surprised by th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You are immediately surprised by the ball's lack of weight. No matter. You'll make it work.

fields.Title: You: ""Sorry, an honest mistake. Are we g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sorry, an honest mistake. Are we good?"

fields.Title: Half Light: "He's trying to avoid conflict at an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's trying to avoid conflict at any cost.

fields.Title: You: ""I don't have a *boule*, but will t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't have a *boule*, but will this do?" (Hold out the shot put ball.)

You: "Feel the ball."
fields.Dialogue Text: Feel the ball.

Hand/Eye Coordination: "It felt like you were going for a t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It felt like you were going for a thrust or a lunge -- there was definitely gonna be jumping. Maybe you scored a point, but this is a *fiasco*.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm sensing anger. And I don't und..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sensing anger. And I don't understand why."

fields.Title: You: ""The damn ball was slippery as fuck..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The damn ball was slippery as fuck! How do you expect me to throw this piece of *shit* when it's got old man spunk all over, Mossback?!"

fields.Title: You: ""I was going for something cool, bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was going for something cool, but I screwed it up, like always..."

IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Composure: "Look who's talking -- that cockatoo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look who's talking -- that cockatoo uniform must give him a real advantage. When fighting in *the circus*.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The cold metal ball is surprisingly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The cold metal ball is surprisingly smooth against your neck. It has a pattern on it. (Probably a sponsored ball.) Yours would only be covered with bumps of learning and scars of victory.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, I will try to fix this." (Ac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, I will try to fix this." (Accept the task.)

fields.Title: You: ""Perfect throw? Well, I still feel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Perfect throw? Well, I still feel defeated."

fields.Title: You: "Take in the surroundings."
fields.Dialogue Text: Take in the surroundings.

HasShoes()
!(HasShoes())
You: "Hold on, why *did* it feel so wrong..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hold on, why *did* it feel so wrong?

fields.Title: Jump to: [SISTERBREAST]
René Arnoux: ""*Merde*!" the old soldier yells in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Merde*!" the old soldier yells in outrage. "*Bordel de merde*!!!"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Just talk. It'll smooth things over..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just talk. It'll smooth things over. Old people like attention.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "There are no two more harmful words..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There are no two more harmful words an athlete can hear than *good job*. And this was downright embarrassing!

fields.Title: Half Light: "Mossback and his shitty ball are mo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Mossback and his shitty ball are mocking you. You need to get angry. Use swear-words. Mention *spunk*.

fields.Title: You: ""I thought it was shot-put.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I thought it was shot-put."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Probably because those rooster pan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Probably because those rooster pants are squeezing you senseless. What ever happened to practical? Durable? Revachol-made?" He shakes his head. "Now what can I do for you?"

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.rene_rc_rhet_whorehose_of_shit"]
Variable["plaza.rene_rc_rhet_whorehose_of_shit"]
!(Variable["plaza.rene_rc_rhet_whorehose_of_shit"])
René Arnoux: ""How are you ever going to get the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How are you ever going to get the officer's shit off your nose, Gaston? Or even climb out of his ass?" He shakes his head in extreme disdain.

fields.Title: Jump to: [ahub]
Rhetoric: "Yes... why *did* you come here? It'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes... why *did* you come here? It's unlikely they know anything about the murder.

fields.Title: You: ""Pee-tank?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pee-tank?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant says nothing, but hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant says nothing, but his face is rigid. It seems he does not approve of your athletic displays.

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Thank you, officer." The jolly man..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you, officer." The jolly man quickly takes the ball and bounces it in his hand. "This is really something... Honestly I think it's better than our old *boule* even!"

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Gaston Martin: ""It's okay, officer. Forgotten comp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's okay, officer. Forgotten completely. It was my *boule* and I have a spare." He produces another ball from his pocket. "Everything is good and we're ready to assist any way we can!"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm sorry.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sorry."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Your guess is as good as mine, off..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Your guess is as good as mine, officer. Maybe you're just one of those men who's never satisfied with anything?" He shrugs. "Regardless, what do you need from us?"

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "A chilly breeze ruffles your hair a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A chilly breeze ruffles your hair as you stand there, feet firmly planted. All sounds, smells, even the wind -- everything fades until the only thing left is the union of Man and Ball.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""What the HELL is your problem?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What the HELL is your problem?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, officer..." The lieutenant gi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, officer..." The lieutenant gives you a quick side-glance. "What *do* we need from these gentlemen?"

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""No, no you don't! Our pétanque gam..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, no you don't! Our pétanque game is ruined!" He's getting angry again. "We want our *boule* back."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""No, we are not *good*, goddamnit!"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, we are not *good*, goddamnit!" A vein on his forehead is bulging alarmingly. "We want our *boule* back!"

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Yes, pétanque," the man says, rais..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, pétanque," the man says, raising his voice again. "You ruined our pétanque game. We want our *boule* back."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait... what?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait... what?"

fields.Title: CheckEquipped("pants_bellbottom")
CheckEquipped("pants_bellbottom")
!(CheckEquipped("pants_bellbottom"))
Gaston Martin: ""What are you talking about? You ju..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you talking about? You just executed a pretty much perfect pétanque throw!" His tone is full of admiration.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: "The man in the uniform says nothing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man in the uniform says nothing. His gaze is fixed on the horizon.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Yeah! Gaps you tried to fill with *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah! Gaps you tried to fill with *thinking*. We don't *think* in sports. We *DO*!

fields.Title: Authority: "You are an officer of the law with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You are an officer of the law with way more important things to worry about than *boules*. Don't take this crap.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Will this...." He falls silent and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Will this...." He falls silent and stares at the ball. "No, it will *goddamn* not..."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Right," the old soldier says slowl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right," the old soldier says slowly. "Was the demonstration *it*, or do you still need something from us, officer?"

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "God, this is right -- you feel the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: God, this is right -- you feel the familiar tremble of excitement and adrenaline that precedes every victory. Time has frozen.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "*Some* would still say you're a cop..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Some* would still say you're a cop, but I guess we're beyond that now.

fields.Title: You: ""The throw was terrible and you kno..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The throw was terrible and you know it. No need to mock me."

fields.Title: You: "There is time for a last glance inw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is time for a last glance inward. Who am I?

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "Everything has gone very quiet. It..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Everything has gone very quiet. It seems as even the waves have ceased their crashing against the promenade. It feels heavy.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Well, it damn well isn't, it's pét..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, it damn well isn't, it's pétanque," the man snaps, raising his voice again. "You ruined a pétanque game. We want our *boule* back!"

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Untitled hub (02)
You: ""Don't be a sore loser, it's still..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't be a sore loser, it's still a fair game between you two. Second place is a podium position."

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "An embodiment of pure motion. A fin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An embodiment of pure motion. A fine-tuned *locomotor* running at maximum efficiency.

fields.Title: Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
Logic: "You never know, he *might* know som..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You never know, he *might* know something. This is a good vantage point.

fields.Title: Endurance: "A man his age getting worked up lik..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A man his age getting worked up like that? Better watch that blood pressure.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "It wasn't *whorehouse of shit*. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It wasn't *whorehouse of shit*. The shot was at least 23 metres. Probably 24 and then some. Nothing to be embarrassed about.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Spring slush on bare feet can make..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Spring slush on bare feet can make a man feel like a failure." He points at your naked toes. "For a reason. Now, do you need something from us?"

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Already your muscles are adjusting..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Already your muscles are adjusting to the weight, the nervous system calibrating, until you and the ball have merged into a single entity. The *manball* is ready.

fields.Title: Jump to: [ahub]
You: ""I thought something way more spect..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I thought something way more spectacular would happen."

fields.Title: SISTERBREAST
Half Light: "With a pinch of fear."
fields.Dialogue Text: With a pinch of fear.

fields.Title: You: ""Not a weak right triceps, that's f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not a weak right triceps, that's for sure."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""I don't care if you are a cop -- y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't care if you are a cop -- you *do not* just ruin someone's game. It's so goddamn disrespectful!"

fields.Title: You: "Let go. Be the ball. (Continue.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: Let go. Be the ball. (Continue.)
fields.Alternate1: The inertia can be contained no more than a bullet leaving a gun. Let go. Be the bullet. (Continue.)

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Behold the fear and confusion refle..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Behold the fear and confusion reflecting in the eyes of the two feeble geezers -- they are in awe of your superiority. You are a God to them.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Good." He nods. "Mistakes are forg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good." He nods. "Mistakes are forgiven, when men at least *try* to right their wrongs. I believe you will try. Now why did you approach us?"

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Take it easy, René." The jolly one..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Take it easy, René." The jolly one tries to defuse the situation. "This is just a misunderstanding, isn't it, officer? No harm done."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""*Mon dieu*," the jolly man exclaim..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Mon dieu*," the jolly man exclaims. "Good job, officer. That was an excellent throw!"

fields.Title: You: ""That's just how Johnny Ballgame is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's just how Johnny Ballgame is -- extraordinary."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "It wasn't *merde*. The shot was at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It wasn't *merde*. The shot was at least 23 metres. Probably 24 and then some. Nothing to be embarrassed about.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm a god of track and field. Why..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm a god of track and field. Why would I have a problem with anything?"

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: "His merry partner is staring at the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His merry partner is staring at the ground like he's trying to see right through to the other side.

fields.Title: You: ""Listen, guys, the ball is gone, an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Listen, guys, the ball is gone, and I have a murder to solve, alright?" (Refuse task.)

fields.Title: Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant is looking at you. H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant is looking at you. His face is expressionless.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Of course there's harm done, you o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course there's harm done, you orange slug!" The heel of his cavalry boot slams in the ground. "You owe us a goddamn *boule*!"

fields.Title: Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
René Arnoux: ""You vandalized our game, son." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You vandalized our game, son." He tries to calm himself. "We can't play pétanque with five *boules*."

fields.Title: Shivers: "West, in the Grand Couron Arena, a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: West, in the Grand Couron Arena, a sharp overhand left from Arsène-Luc Edelbrock, sends the Samaran heavyweight champion, Kostya 'Mjasnok' Koštunica, flying to the mat. The crowd goes wild. Revachol loves her heroes.

fields.Title: You: ""Oh, pétanque, I understand...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, pétanque, I understand..."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "A *whorehouse of shit*?"
fields.Dialogue Text: A *whorehouse of shit*?

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "This felt... wrong. Wrong like touc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This felt... wrong. Wrong like touching your sister's breast. You threw your sister's breast.
